statements: UPSERT INTO remote_learning (id, course_name, instructor, students) VALUES (1, 'Mathematics', 'John Doe', 30)
UPSERT INTO remote_learning (id, course_name, instructor, students) VALUES (2, 'History', 'Emily Smith', 25)
UPSERT INTO remote_learning (id, course_name, instructor, students) VALUES (3, 'Science', 'Michael Johnson', 20)
UPSERT INTO students (student_id, student_name, course) VALUES (1, 'Alice', 'Math');
UPSERT INTO courses (course_id, course_name, instructor) VALUES (101, 'Math', 'John');
UPSERT INTO students (student_id, student_name, course) VALUES (2, 'Bob', 'Science');
UPSERT INTO students (student_id, student_name, email, age) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 25)
UPSERT INTO courses (course_id, course_name, instructor, description) VALUES (101, 'Mathematics', 'Prof. Smith', 'Introduction to Mathematics')
UPSERT INTO enrollments (enrollment_id, student_id, course_id, enrollment_date) VALUES (201, 1, 101, '2022-01-15')

UPSERT INTO courses (course_id, course_name, instructor_name, credits) VALUES (1, 'Mathematics', 'Prof. Smith', 3) ON CONFLICT (course_id) DO UPDATE SET course_name = excluded.course_name, instructor_name = excluded.instructor_name, credits = excluded.credits;

UPSERT INTO students (student_id, student_name, email, course_id) VALUES (1, 'Alice', 'alice@example.com', 1) ON CONFLICT (student_id) DO UPDATE SET student_name = excluded.student_name, email = excluded.email, course_id = excluded.course_id;

UPSERT INTO assignments (assignment_id, assignment_name, course_id, due_date) VALUES (1, 'Homework 1', 1, '2022-08-15') ON CONFLICT (assignment_id) DO UPDATE SET assignment_name = excluded.assignment_name, course_id = excluded.course_id, due_date = excluded.due_date;

UPSERT INTO Courses (course_id, course_name, instructor, duration) VALUES (1, 'Mathematics', 'Prof. Smith', 60) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE course_name = VALUES(course_name), instructor = VALUES(instructor), duration = VALUES(duration);

UPSERT INTO Students (student_id, student_name, email, age) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 25) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE student_name = VALUES(student_name), email = VALUES(email), age = VALUES(age);

UPSERT INTO Enrollments (enrollment_id, student_id, course_id, enrollment_date) VALUES (1, 1, 1, '2022-01-01') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE student_id = VALUES(student_id), course_id = VALUES(course_id), enrollment_date = VALUES(enrollment_date);
